executiveReport.businessImpact: HIGH - Immediate legal risk, potential €20M fines, regulatory investigation likely

bannerAnalysis.text: Cookies ButtonWarum verwenden wir Cookies und andere Tracking-Technologien?Unsere Website verwendet ein Skript (z. B. Cookies), das Informationen in Ihrem Browser und auf Ihrem Gerät lesen, speichern
buttonTexts: enable cookie auto-blocking to ensure compliance
optimize your cookie consent banner to maximize opt-ins

violations.title: Pre-consent Tracking Script Execution
violations.description: Tracking scripts executed before user consent obtained
violations.businessImpact: Unlawful processing of personal data, potential fines up to €20M
violations.remediation: Implement consent-gated script loading using CMP integration

violations.title: Consent Bypass Vulnerability
violations.description: Technical methods detected to bypass consent mechanism
violations.businessImpact: Systematic GDPR violations, potential criminal liability
violations.remediation: Implement server-side consent validation and audit trails

recommendations.action: Implement consent-gated loading for all tracking technologies

legalAnalysis.legalRisk: HIGH - Fundamental consent violations detected. Immediate remediation required.
legalAnalysis.regulatoryAction: Regulatory investigation risk if user complaints filed. Priority remediation advised.
legalAnalysis.fineExposure: Up to €20M or 4% of annual turnover for systematic consent violations
